review: The product's description does not explicitly state that Chromecast requires devices to be on the same WIFI Router for it to work. So, Chromecast cannot be used to make large screen presentations at locations where one cannot gain access to a business's Secure WIFI network. When I tested the Chromecast dongle I received yesterday, I found out that it also does not support the Miracast standard, therefore I was not able to mirror my PowerPoint presentation (from my Windows-PC  to the large TV screen) using Chromecast. Also sadly, the Chromecast dongle dropped the connection intermittently, and sometimes the picture and sound "froze" on the TV screen -- even while using the Chromecast Extension in the Chrome Browser (to project Youtube videos from my PC to the large TV screen).
